TextView.android:text: Issuance of Certificate of Ownership of Large Cattle
A certificate which will be issue to the owner of the large animals after verification of identity marks of the aforementioned. It is a credential of legitimacy of ownership of the animal.
Residents of the Municipality of Kitaotao who own large cattle
1. Barangay Certification with Official Receipt (1 original copy)
Case 1: For Group and Far Area
1. Request Letter from the Barangay Official
2. Barangay Certification with Official Receipt (1 original copy)
1. Barangay Certification with Official Receipt (1 original copy)
1.2. Read and Examine the letter request
1.3. Make a schedule for the credential activity
1.4. Approve the schedule for the credential activity
2.1. Travelling to the location of credential activity
3.1. Conduct the examination of the Animal licks and other marks as ingenuity of identity
3.2. Records the examined marks and licks of the animal to the Certificate
4.1. Issue Official Receipt and Certificate of Ownership
5. Receive the credential/ Certificate of Ownership
5.1. Release the Credential to the owner of large Cattle.
6. Accomplish the Client Satisfaction Survey (CSS) and drop it in the Feedback Box
4. Request the client to accomplish the Client Satisfaction Survey (CSS)
1.3. Make a schedule for the credential activity
1.4. Approve the schedule for the credential activity
2.1. Travelling to the location of credential activity
3.1. Conduct the examination of the Animal licks and other marks as ingenuity of identity
3.2. Records the examined marks and licks of the animal to the Certificate
4.1. Issue Official Receipt and Certificate of Ownership
5. Receive the credential/ Certificate of Ownership
5.1. Release the Credential to the owner of large Cattle.
6. Accomplish the Client Satisfaction Survey (CSS) and drop it in the Feedback Box
6.1. Request the client to accomplish the Client Satisfaction Survey (CSS)
